text: George T Birks is an English former fencer. ==Fencing career== He represented England and won a gold medal in the team sabre at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He was a member of the London Polytechnic Fencing Club where he was a pupil of Bela Imregi. ==References== Category:Living people Category:British male fencers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in fencing Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Fencers at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: George Birks
